mapper.insert: /* IMCmmnAccssHstryMapper.insert */ INSERT INTO im_cmmn_accss_hstry ( cmmn_accss_hstry_id, tbl_id, tbl_ref_id, ref_nm, esntl_id, mmbr_info, dvs_info, frst_reg_dt, frst_reger_ip ) VALUES ( #{cmmnAccssHstryId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tblId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tblRefId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{esntlId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mmbrInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dvsInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATETIME, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{frstRegerIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
